attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: to change the law of legel aid and to grant legal aid to all those in respect of fraud being committed against an individual; particularly in respect of purchase of a business; where that business has presented fraudulent accounts to the purchaser in order to maximise a sale:  thus leaving the purchaser in a bankruptcy situation within a three month take up of the business.

rejection.details: Your title should be a call for action, not a name.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
